content.rendered:
Our team of specialist marine consultants provide a comprehensive suite of safety and security Audits including:

  • International Safety Management code (ISM) Audits
  • International Ship & Port Facility Security (ISPS) audits
  • Navigational Audits
  • Vessel suitability assessments, voyage and towage approvals and marine warranty surveys for commercial vessels and yachts

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Transportation / Vessel Design
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is involved in all stages of a Marine transportation project, from conversion of an existing vessel or the development of a fit for purpose new build. New Build From pre-tender voyage assessments and optimisation of fleets, AqualisBraemar can prepare outline specifications, complete tender bid evaluations, assist with technical and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is a specialised marine and engineering consultancy focusing on the shallow and deep-water offshore segments of the oil & gas and renewables industries worldwide.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Organisations
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar AqualisBraemar is a company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 33 countries. Offshore Wind Consultants…

jetpack-related-posts.title: DP FMEA & Audit - Dynamic Positioning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide an experienced multidisciplinary team of engineering and operational resources to support the DP industry. Aqualis delivers dynamic positioning services including DP FMEA, DP audit, DP Assurance and DP project management.
